title: #1497 Where In The World is Gavin Sandiego?
itunes:title: #1497 Where In The World is Gavin Sandiego?
description:
At the top of the show, Dr. Drew floats a theory to Adam about the Love Boat era, and actresses aging out of their 'glamour' days. They go on to discuss the impact of cinema on the way people dress and speak, as well as other anthropological lessons you can learn from past pop culture. Drew also tells Adam about his deep dive on the old show, 'Mr. Ed', and the show wraps up with a conversation about Gavin Newsom's absence from the public eye.

Please support our sponsors:
Subscribe to The Jordan Harbinger Show

Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
